changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS REMSFAL.issues ( project_id UUID, issue_id UUID, title TEXT, type TEXT, status TEXT, priority TEXT, reporter_id UUID, agreement_id UUID, assignee_id UUID, description TEXT, parent_issue_id UUID, children_issue_ids set<UUID>, related_to_issue_ids set<UUID>, duplicate_of_issue_ids set<UUID>, blocked_by_issue_ids set<UUID>, blocks_issue_ids set<UUID>, created_at TIMESTAMP, modified_at TIMESTAMP, PRIMARY KEY (project_id, issue_id) ) WITH CLUSTERING ORDER BY (issue_id ASC);
CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS issues_issue_id_idx ON REMSFAL.issues (issue_id);
